reports.name: CIDR
reports.comment: Networks must be configured during installation, it's possible to use 10.128.0.0/14

reports.name: HostSubnetLength
reports.comment:
Networks must be configured during installation,
 hostSubnetLength was replaced with hostPrefix in OCP4, default value was set to 23
Networks must be configured during installation
Configuration of ExternalIPNetworkCIDRs is not supported in OCP4
Translation of this configuration is not supported, refer to ingress operator configuration for more information
